last_episode_to_air.name: Destroy All Monsters
last_episode_to_air.overview: Abbi and Tilda band together with an unexpected ally to go after Sarkov, who has big plans for Juan. New revelations bring new challenges for the group.

name: The Imperfects
overview: After an experimental gene therapy turns them into monsters, three twenty-somethings band together to hunt down the scientist responsible and force him to make them human again.

episodes.name: Sarkov's Children
episodes.overview: Three test subjects of an elaborate experiment start experiencing strange symptoms and turn to geneticist Dr. Alex Sarkov for help.

episodes.name: Doug of the Dead
episodes.overview: In hopes of finding Sarkov, the Imperfects look for another Wellness Program participant while dealing with the fallout from their new powers.

episodes.name: Portland Warehouse Massacre
episodes.overview: The search for Sarkov leads Juan, Abbi and Tilda into a seriously messed up situation. A mysterious woman begins to zero in on her targets.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.overview: While Juan reconnects with family, Abbi and Tilda meet another test subject with powers of his own. Investigators start to hunt for the Imperfects.

episodes.name: Zoe Must Be Destroyed
episodes.overview: At Sarkov's home, Tilda and Juan make a shocking discovery. Abbi and Hannah worry that Finch may pose a threat to Dr. Burke.

episodes.name: Lest Ye Become a Monster
episodes.overview: Burke and Sarkov begin work on a cure, with Burke as the test subject. When government agents track them down, the group rallies to fend them off.

episodes.name: Cure All
episodes.overview: Abbi, Juan and Tilda investigate an attack after a mutant strikes. Sarkov inches closer to a cure, while Burke has a breakthrough.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.overview: In need of nanobots to distribute his cure, Sarkov sends the team on a mission to Idaho. Burke and Finch team up to stay one step ahead of Dr. Crain.

episodes.name: All Monsters Attack
episodes.overview: After receiving bad news from home, Abbi attempts to replicate the cure. Juan attends a party. Tilda tries to warn Sarkov of the risks of using nanobots.

episodes.name: Destroy All Monsters
episodes.overview: Abbi and Tilda band together with an unexpected ally to go after Sarkov, who has big plans for Juan. New revelations bring new challenges for the group.
